Supporters

FameLab has a wide variety of partners and supporters in all of the countries that the competition operates and a small selection of these are shown below. We’d like to thank all of our sponsors, without their support FameLab would not happen.

By becoming part of the FameLab partnership you will join a stellar line up of organisations and individuals who appreciate and value the work that Famelab does and its influence across a wide area of science communication.

Help support this fantastic competition and work with us to develop it to the next level

  • Gain access to a fabulous ‘alumni’ of some of the best young communicators in the country

    • Help us make sure that science and engineering are promoted at the grass roots level by developingyoung talent

  • Help to organisations and companies recognise the value of public engagement

If you are interested in becoming associated with this exciting and world leading programme to identify, train and mentor tommorrow's science and engineering communicators, then please contact us at international@famelab.org. We are particularly interested in working with global partners who can help us expand and develop the FameLab format in countries all over the world.

 
University of Belgrade - Serbia
Science2Public, Austria
HEMDA - Israel
Thomas J Bata Foundation - Czech Republic
Ministry Of Science, Education & Sports - Croatia
National Authority for Scientific Research - Romania
Intel - Romania
NESTA - UK
Bank of Cyprus - Cypus
Croucher Foundation - Hong Kong
Microsoft - Bulgaria
University of Zurich - Switzerland
Vodafone - Egypt
